import React, { Component } from 'react' import {PageHeader} from 'react-bootstrap' import {Form,FormGroup,FormControl,Col,Checkbox,Button,ControlLabel} from 'react-bootstrap' import './Style.css' export default class Login extends Component { state={ users:[], EmailValue:"", PasswordValue:"", CheckBoxValue:false } EmailhandleChange=(e)=>this.setState({EmailValue:e.target.value}) PasswordhandleChange=(e)=>this.setState({PasswordValue:e.target.value}) clickedCheck=()=>{ let temp=!this.state.CheckBoxValue this.setState({CheckBoxValue:temp}) } render() { return (
Login
Email this.EmailhandleChange(e)}/> Password this.PasswordhandleChange(e)}/> {this.state.CheckBoxValue}
;
) } }
